songs.title: Hell Wit Ya
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
What is this? I heard that you’ve got a new miss
Just broke up so you know that I’m pissed
They say you’re faithful
I don’t believe that shh, oh no, oh no

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh I’ve tried to act like I don’t care
But it doesn’t seem fair you’re so good to her
And I’ve tried to pretend I don’t see
All those things that you do you couldn’t do for me

[Chorus]
I was in love wit ya but to hell wit ya
Because you didn’t want to treat me right
I was in love wit ya but to hell wit ya
Because you didn’t want to treat me right
Now you got another girl in your life
Giving her love all day, all night
I was in love wit ya but to hell wit ya
Because you didn’t want to treat me right

[Verse 2]
So I hear, I have met the winch before
(Yeah, I remember that time we went to Pizza Hut
You told me she was your cousin)
I hear you learned to open doors
(When did you become such a damn gentleman?)

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh I’ve tried to act like I don’t care
But it doesn’t seem fair you’re so good to her
And I’ve tried to pretend I don’t see
All those things that you do you couldn’t do for me

[Chorus]
I was in love wit ya but to hell wit ya
Because you didn’t want to treat me right
I was in love wit ya but to hell wit ya
Because you didn’t want to treat me right
Now you got another girl in your life
Giving her love all day, all night
I was in love wit ya but to hell wit ya
Because you didn’t want to treat me right

[Bridge}
What does she do to you?
To make you give her everything
Like you never did for me
Call it jealousy but it is killing me
Because all the time that you were mine
You didn’t treat me right
No you didn’t treat me right, no, no
Whoa

[Chorus]
I was in love wit ya but to hell wit ya
Because you didn’t want to treat me right
I was in love wit ya but to hell wit ya
Because you didn’t want to treat me right
Now you got another girl in your life
Giving her love all day, all night
I was in love wit ya but to hell wit ya
Because you didn’t want to treat me right

[Outro]
All day, all night
Love wit ya but to hell wit ya
Because you didn’t want to treat me right
Did not want to treat me right
